[{"id":"JT-31362","entityId":"25-993548","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"31362"},{"name":"summary","value":"No validation for branches on vcs integration form"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1439283862165"},{"name":"updated","value":"1522764953098"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"Anna.Zhdan"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Anna Zhdan"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"Ekaterina_Zaikina"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Ekaterina Zaikina"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"false"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"JT-29363","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"},{"value":"YTB-847","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Integrations"],"valueId":["Integrations"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend","Settings"],"valueId":["Frontend","Settings"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Major"],"valueId":["Major"],"color":{"bg":"#ffee9c","fg":"#b45f06"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"7.0","id":"old YouTrack board:7.0"},{"value":"sprint 64","id":"YouTrack:sprint 64"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"JT-39716","entityId":"25-1420485","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"39716"},{"name":"summary","value":"Requirements: no quick fixes shown on wf tab when rule is deactivated"},{"name":"description","value":"
STR:
  • Attach a WF with some requirements to project.
  • Check out project WF tab.
  • Deactivate the rule with non-applied quick fixes.
ER:
Quick fixes are still suggested.
AR:
Only 'requires setup' tag is shown, without suggestions. This is quite misleading, as I can't check a problem out until I activate the rule.
"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1485344303133"},{"name":"updated","value":"1522764953095"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"Anna.Zhdan"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Anna Zhdan"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"mary"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Mariya Davydova"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"false"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"JT-39715","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"},{"value":"YTB-847","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Workflow"],"valueId":["Workflow"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Usability Problem"],"valueId":["Usability Problem"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 64","id":"YouTrack:sprint 64"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"JT-36108","entityId":"25-1232107","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"36108"},{"name":"summary","value":"List of workflow problems not updated after quickfix apply"},{"name":"description","value":"
STR
  1. attach default workflow "Pomodoro Timer v2" to some project
  2. see "requires setup"
  3. go to rules
  4. press one quickfix
  5. same quickfix remains for other rules
"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1466409468876"},{"name":"updated","value":"1522764930238"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"Anna.Zhdan"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Anna Zhdan"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"pavel.nikitin"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Pavel Nikitin"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"1"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"false"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"JT-39935","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"},{"value":"YTB-847","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Workflow"],"valueId":["Workflow"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend","Settings"],"valueId":["Frontend","Settings"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Usability Problem"],"valueId":["Usability Problem"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 64","id":"YouTrack:sprint 64"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"27-1514706","author":"mary","authorFullName":"Mariya Davydova","issueId":"JT-36108","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
I do not think that it is Major because it no harm in reapplying the same fix (it is just not applied if the entity is already added).

Pavel Nikitin should we support it in YT 6.5? or we can move it to 6.5.next?
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1438953663378,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-1111607","author":"xi-eye","authorFullName":"Alexander Anisimov","issueId":"JT-31218","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Pavel Nikitin does GAP REST support workflow stuff?
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1441884495052,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2767698","author":"pasha","authorFullName":"Pavel Nikolaev","issueId":"JT-31218","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Project custom field of type [state] with attached state machine will be returned as a separate $type and extended with a property:

{
  $type: StateMachineProjectCustomField 
  hasStateMachine: true
}
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1521718139793,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2769206","author":"Leonid.Stryuk","authorFullName":"Leonid Stryuk","issueId":"JT-31218","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
state machine data is available into
field.plugins.workflow = {
hasStateMachine:boolean
}

NB do not request this data everywhere, cause it is required only on admin pages
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1521736158974,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2769218","author":"Leonid.Stryuk","authorFullName":"Leonid Stryuk","issueId":"JT-31218","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
StateMachineProjectCustomField

Pavel Nikolaev that is true for IssueCustomField.
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1521736602038,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2769370","author":"pasha","authorFullName":"Pavel Nikolaev","issueId":"JT-31218","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Leonid Stryuk, no it's about ProjectCustomField, for IssueCustomField it's StateMachineIssueCustomField

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1521738604154,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2769405","author":"pasha","authorFullName":"Pavel Nikolaev","issueId":"JT-31218","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Ok, I've dropped my solution, take @Leonid Stryuk one, since it doesn't modify $type for reading/writing gap entities and doesn't break gap rest rules.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1521739394171,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}]
